ğŸ“– HELP - DISCORD PRIORITY MANAGER PRO
Gaming Edition v1.0
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ¯ WHAT DOES THIS PROGRAM DO?

Discord Priority Manager is a specialized utility for gamers
that automatically manages Discord process priorities during games.

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

â“ WHY IS THIS NEEDED?

Problem:
Discord sometimes uses too much CPU,
which can cause lag and freezes in games, especially CS2, Valorant and
other competitive games where every FPS matters.

Solution:
1. The program detects when you launch a game
2. Automatically lowers Discord process priorities
3. Discord starts using less CPU
4. CPU resources are freed for the game, eliminating lag!

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âš™ï¸ SETTINGS DESCRIPTION:

ğŸ¯ PRIORITIES:

â–ª During games:
  â€¢ Idle (IDLE) - Recommended! Discord uses minimum CPU
  â€¢ Below Normal - Medium option
  â€¢ Normal - Discord runs at full performance (game may lag)

â–ª Normal mode (no games):
  â€¢ Idle - Resource saving
  â€¢ Below Normal - Recommended! Performance balance
  â€¢ Normal - Maximum Discord performance

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âœ“ SETTINGS:

â–ª Start with Windows
  Enabled: Program starts automatically on system boot
  Disabled: Must be launched manually

ğŸ’¡ IMPORTANT:
Automatic game detection and priority correction are ALWAYS active â€”
this is the core function of the program that works automatically for
maximum gaming performance.

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ® CONTROL BUTTONS:

â–¶ Start Monitoring
  Starts tracking Discord processes and managing priorities

â¹ Stop Monitoring
  Stops the program, priorities remain unchanged

ğŸ® Game Management
  Opens a window for adding/removing games from the tracking list

â„¹ Help
  You are here! ğŸ˜Š

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“Š MONITORING STATUS:

â–ª Processes found â€” Number of Discord processes (usually 5â€“10)
â–ª Corrections â€” How many times the program corrected priority
â–ª Last change â€” When priority was last changed
â–ª Total CPU usage â€” Combined CPU usage of all Discord processes

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ¯ GAME MODE:

When the program detects a running game from the list, it:
1. Shows notification "ğŸ® Game detected: [name]"
2. Switches Discord to gaming priority (usually IDLE)
3. Checks processes more frequently (every 1 second instead of 2)
4. Restores normal priority when the game closes

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

â• HOW TO ADD YOUR GAME:

STEP-BY-STEP GUIDE:

1. Click "ğŸ® Game Management" in the main window

2. Find your game process name:
   â€¢ Open Task Manager (Ctrl + Shift + Esc)
   â€¢ Go to the "Details" tab
   â€¢ Launch your game
   â€¢ Find the game process in the list
   â€¢ Remember the EXACT filename (e.g. "valorant.exe")

3. In the "Game Management" window:
   â€¢ Enter the process name
   â€¢ The .exe extension will be added automatically
   â€¢ Click "â• Add Game"
   â€¢ Click "ğŸ’¾ Save"

4. Done! The program will now automatically detect your game

PROCESS NAME EXAMPLES:
âœ“ CS2: cs2.exe
âœ“ Valorant: valorant.exe or valorant-win64-shipping.exe
âœ“ Dota 2: dota2.exe
âœ“ League of Legends: leagueoflegends.exe
âœ“ Apex Legends: r5apex.exe
âœ“ Fortnite: fortniteclient-win64-shipping.exe
âœ“ Rainbow Six Siege: rainbow6.exe

â— IMPORTANT:
â€¢ Process name must be EXACT (case-insensitive)
â€¢ Some games have multiple processes â€” add the main one
â€¢ If unsure, check Task Manager while the game is running

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âš ï¸ IMPORTANT:

â€¢ Administrator rights are required to change priorities
â€¢ The program does NOT affect Discord voice quality
â€¢ All settings are saved automatically
â€¢ The program runs in the background (system tray)

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ’¡ TIPS:

âœ“ Keep game priority set to "Idle" â€” this eliminates lag
âœ“ Enable autostart for constant lag protection
âœ“ Add your games via "Game Management" if they are not in the list
âœ“ Watch the "Corrections" counter â€” if it grows fast,
  Discord constantly tries to raise its priority
